product_name: Mountain Khakis Cottonwood Cord Pants - Men's 30" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for flatlanders and mountaineers alike, the casual Mountain Khakis Cottonwood Cord Pants have such a buttery-soft feel that they must be experienced to be believed. Cotton is blended with a touch of spandex for comfortable range of motion. Ergonomically designed hand pockets with an on-seam hidden stow pocket keep keys, cell phone and change secure. 2 rear patch pockets. 2-ply, reinforced rear cuffs deliver ultimate durability to a high-wear area. Mountain Khakis Cottonwood Cord Pants have a casual fit. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for flatlanders and mountaineers alike, the casual Mountain Khakis Cottonwood Cord Pants have such a buttery-soft feel that they must be experienced to be believed.
